sage-border.description: System border style mixin. Omitted values are set to `default` value, `rem(1px) solid sage-color(grey, 300)`

sage-border-interactive.description: System border interactive style mixin. Uses `box-shadow` to emulate border appearance.

sage-breakpoint.description: Breakpoint value for min-width or max-width sizes. Omitted values default to `sm-max` (767px)

sage-color-combo.description: Sage color combos. Note that not all color types are available for combinations.

sage-container.description: Sage container size mixin. Omitted values default to `md` (520px)

sage-font-size.description: Sage font-size mixin. Omitted values default to `md`

sage-font-weight.description: Sage font-weight mixin. Omitted values default to `regular`

sage-grid-gap-options.description: Outputs Sage grid gap spacing value.

sage-grid-template.description: Sage grid-template mixin. Uses predefined grid configurations based on morse code

sage-letter-spacing.description: Sage letter spacing mixin. Omitted values default to `sm` / rem(0.3px)

sage-shadow.description: Sage box-shadow value. Omitted values default to `md`

sage-sidebar.description: Sage box-shadow value. Omitted values default to `md`

sage-spacing.description: Sage spacing value. Omitted values default to `md` / rem(24px)

sage-z-index.description: Output system z-index value. Omitted values are set to `default` (0). Values can be incremented to prevent collisions (use with caution)
